kickstart.post:
import rocks.grub import random
makegrub = rocks.grub.App()
makegrub.setInstallKernel('kickstart/default/vmlinuz-&version;-&arch;') makegrub.setInstallRamdisk('kickstart/default/initrd.img-&version;-&arch;') randomPass = random.randrange(1, 1 << 31)
args = 'build ksdevice=%s lang= devfs=nomount vnc vncpassword=%d central=%s ' \ 'ip=%s gateway=%s netmask=%s dns=%s selinux=0 dropcert' \ % ( '&Kickstart_PublicInterface;', randomPass, '&Kickstart_PublicKickstartHost;', '&Kickstart_PublicAddress;', '&Kickstart_PublicGateway;', '&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;', '&Kickstart_PublicDNSServers;'.split(',')[0])
makegrub.run(args)
